bill.summary: 3/11/1987--Introduced. Amends the Garn-St Germain Depository Institutions Act of 1982 to repeal the termination date of the authority of the National Credit Union Administration Board to: (1) authorize the merger or consolidation of an insured credit union or institution with an insured credit union that is insolvent or in danger of insolvency; and (2) act as conservator for a troubled credit union.
